sentence.Network_en: I sent my other son to the country to stay with kinfolk.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把另一个儿子送到乡下和亲戚住在一起。

sentence.Network_en: The Silver Fangs borrowed many traditions from their noble Kinfolk.
sentence.Network_cn: 银牙从他们的贵族亲属那里借鉴了很多的传统.

sentence.Network_en: Even lupus Kinfolk gather in tightly knit packs.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使狼亲属也被收入结构严密的组织.

sentences.en: All his poor kinfolks came to spend their holidays at his home.
